decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (353-00-02, 353-PR-00, 353-PR-01, 353-PR-02, 353-PR-03, 353-PR-04, 353-PR-05, 353-PR-06, 353-PR-B1, all revision A and all received 20 February 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the alterations hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Installation of new windows, alterations to existing windows and removal of the existing external metal stairs, replace all windows to meet current energy efficiency standards. All replacements to match existing.
